creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: cloth with purple and gold abstract design in wide bands; wide red vertical bands of fabric at each edge; deep, lacy fringe with some purple, gold and red threads; bands of plain cream colored fabric between embroidered bands; some arrow shaped embroidery on some of the plain bands; 2 panels sewn together
title: Table cover
